columns.name: Interaction ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for a composed interaction. All message part lines of all participating roles must have the same Interaction ID

columns.name: Role
columns.description: The role of the message author. Can be system, user, assistant, or tool.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: An optional name for the participant. Provides the model information to differentiate between participants of the same role.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Content part type, can be text, refusal, function, image_url, or input_audio.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: The text (for text and tool Types) or refusal message (for refusal Type) of the content part.

columns.name: Image Url
columns.description: Either a URL of the image or a file path with the image data. Type must be image_url.

columns.name: Detail
columns.description: Specifies the detail level of the image (auto, low, high). Type must be image_url.

columns.name: Audio
columns.description: File path with audio content. wav and mp3 formats supported.

columns.name: Audio Format
columns.description: The format of the encoded audio data. Currently supports wav and mp3.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Controls whether the assistant message is trained against (false or true)

columns.name: Refusal
columns.description: The refusal message by the assistant to refuse entirely the prompt.

columns.name: Audio Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a previous audio response from the model.

columns.name: Function
columns.description: The name of funtion to call or that this message is responding to. Tool type must be function, role must be tool or assistant.

columns.name: Arguments
columns.description: The arguments to call the function with, as generated by the model in JSON format. Type must be function.

columns.name: Parallel Tools
columns.description: Whether to enable parallel function calling during tool use.
